page.shortlink: form layout data group properties properties
page.description: Settings for configuring a Data Group container in a FormView's layout.

description.p: The *[ui:Field name]* property is used to pick the field for the data source that contains hierarchical data with one or more nested arrays of data for each record.
The fully qualified field name for the Data Group. This property is readonly.
An optional JavaScript function to execute before the Data Group is expanded. This function can modify the data in the data array. The function will take these arguments: data, temp, root
An expression that determines whether or not the Data Group is visible.
